  • Classes in org.sakaiproject.section.api.coursemanagement used by org.sakaiproject.api.app.roster 
    Class and Description
    CourseSection
    A subset of a Course that may meet at specific times during the week.
  • Classes in org.sakaiproject.section.api.coursemanagement used by org.sakaiproject.component.app.roster 
    Class and Description
    CourseSection
    A subset of a Course that may meet at specific times during the week.
  • Classes in org.sakaiproject.section.api.coursemanagement used by org.sakaiproject.component.section 
    Class and Description
    Course
    Models a sectionable "class" in higher education.
    CourseSection
    A subset of a Course that may meet at specific times during the week.
    EnrollmentRecord
    A record associating a student to a LearningContext, with a status indicating how the student is enrolled (waitlisted, for instance).
    LearningContext
    A LearningContext is an abstract grouping of users in an academic environment.
    Meeting 
    ParticipationRecord
    Associates a user with a Learning Context.
    SectionEnrollments
    Encapsulates the section enrollments in a course for a set of students.
    User
    Models a User for use in the Section Awareness API and the Section Manager Tool.
